about_the_game:
CS Manager is a passion project over two years in the making, and its finally here! Choose your team and take them to the top of the circuit!

Choose between more than 120 teams

From the most elite pros to the unorganized amateur leagues, choose your team and take them all the way to the top. Or create your own organization and work your way up from the very bottom

Build your squad

Pure skill is not everything when signing players. To create the perfect team dynamic you must take roles, personalities, and languages into consideration

In-depth match engine options

Watch your tactics unfold in a new advanced match engine, that will test your game sense and read of your opponents. Choose between a full match simulation where your timeouts and instructions are played out in real time, a faster simulation with a score overview, or an instant simulation.

Manage dynamic personalities

Your choices and priorities when dealing with conflicts and disputes on the team will be key to your success

Wishlist CS Manager now, and stay tuned for more updates and release in 2025! You can also check out our Discord

name: CS Manager

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10/11
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 11 capabilities
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: CS Manager lets you take control of more than 120 teams. Make key decisions on rosters, strategies, and practice, and adapt to outwit your opponents. Rise to the top of the circuit in an authentic simulation where every choice matters.
